latest_revision.text:
*'''Station Champions:''' Rick Blake
*'''Communication:''' Slack #general channel and maybe include Rickb928
*'''Certification:''' None. Ask for help if you aren't familiar
*'''Events:''' None, but event hosts do use this station

==Overview==
This is station to set up to present for events or meetups. Along with a projector with various adapters for video we have a wireless microphone. Or just connect to Bluetooth to play music from the speakers.

==Equipment==

*[https://mackie.com/en/products/mixers/profxv3-series/ProFX10v3plus.html Mackie ProFX10v3+ 10-Channel Analog Mixer]. [https://mackie.com/img/file_resources/PROFXV3+_MIXER_SERIES_OM.pdf Manual] [https://mackie.com/img/file_resources/PROFXV3+_SERIES_SS.pdf Spec Sheet] [https://mackie.com/img/file_resources/ProFXv3+_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide]
**Sennheiser wireless microphone (over ear). Should already be connected to the mixer. Takes 9 Volt battery, plan to have one in case it dies
**Logitech Bluetooth input. Push the connect button to sync and play audio over the speakers
* [https://epson.com/For-Home/Projectors/Home-Cinema/PowerLite-Home-Cinema-740HD-720p-3LCD-Projector/p/V11H764020 PowerLite Home Cinema 740HD Projector]. [https://files.support.epson.com/docid/cpd4/cpd42907.pdf Manual]
**HDMI or ChromeCast  among other connection options
* Webcam Logitech Carl Zeiss Tessar Hd 1080p
*ADS Tech RDX-150-EF Instant Music
*Oculus Rift
